H1.text: What is the capital of Venezuela. Valencia

H3.text: What is the capital of Venezuela. Carcas

A4.text: Caracas is the capital and largest city of Venezuela

A5.text: In 1577, Caracas became the capital of the Spanish Empire's Venezuela Province
